titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a criminal penalty for certain Federal officers and employees using their public office for private gain, and for other purposes.
E. Scott Pruitt Accountability for Government Officials Act of 2018
E. Scott Pruitt Accountability for Government Officials Act of 2018
E. Scott Pruitt Accountability for Government Officials Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
